title: Putin shows off Russia's hi-tech arms in hawkish speech
text:
Putin shows off Russia's hi-tech arms in hawkish speech 2:19pm GMT - 01:00 
President Vladimir Putin unveils Russia's latest nuclear weapons, saying they are capable of hitting almost anywhere in the world without being intercepted. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
President Vladimir Putin unveils Russia's latest nuclear weapons, saying they are capable of hitting almost anywhere in the world without being intercepted. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/01/putin-shows-off-russias-hi-tech-arms-in?videoId=405290019&videoChannel=13422
